attributes.action: Require (re)election of one half of our MP's each two years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our present system of democracy,while better than some,does not involve the electorate sufficiently.To some,maybe many,it appears that the only time the views of the ordinary citizen matters is at election time.Even then it is his/her vote that is wanted not an opinion.Consequently,I petition that one half of our MP's/AM's be required to stand for election/re-election each two years.This would be one step to ensure that the voice of the electors can influence Parliament on a more frequent/ongoing basis.
